commands.step: Create a new ALSA configuration file
Paste the following contents into the file
commands.cmd:
pcm.!default {
    type route
    slave.pcm dmix51
    slave.channels 6

    ttable.0.1 1
    ttable.1.0 1

    ttable.2.3 0.7
    ttable.3.2 0.7
    ttable.4.4 0.7
    ttable.5.5 0.7

    ttable.0.3 1
    ttable.1.2 1

    ttable.0.4 0.5
    ttable.1.4 0.5
    ttable.0.5 0.5
    ttable.1.5 0.5
}
pcm.dmix51 {
type dmix
ipc_key 1024
ipc_key_add_uid false 
ipc_perm 0660 #
slave {
pcm surround51 
rates 48000
channels 6
period_time 0
period_size 1024
buffer_time 0
buffer_size 4096
}
}
